column2:
All Source-Collection Manager (CO-CLO-001): Identifies collection authorities and environment; incorporates priority information requirements into collection management; develops concepts to meet leadership's intent. Determines capabilities of available collection assets, identifies new collection capabilities; and constructs and disseminates collection plans.  Monitors execution of tasked collection to ensure effective execution of the collection plan. Click to view the Master KSA List
